text:
Hello,
I'm trying to improve an integration by reducing the amount of non required syncs for contacts. (For companies last updated is available per field so it's done)

I use the method:
getRecentlyModified  for
Which brings me a custom collection of properties (The fields to sync)

I would like to be able to find out when the properties were changed or what properties were changed. Is there any way of doing it?

There are some workflows/lists running on HS that update the data in fields that doesn't matter for the sync, notes, lists, etc. and send 4000-5000 records for sync often
Sample result:
```{
   addedAt: 1601371630904,
   vid: 7723801,
   'canonical-vid': 7723801,
   'merged-vids': [],
   'portal-id': 6085627,
   'is-contact': true,
   'profile-token': 'AO_T-mPcoWC2FvwhkQ4Phuavx79bmAUhrmw7FXeIaewG-DDdy5VNQu8upDciQlMHW8sp_eIMd2eBGb2J4uPzOAE5WGbqwdMe4h414neKYMEq1uVrIJwxRvLqOC-1ONI0Gvd4hAJxSrDf',
   'profile-url': '<https://app.HubSpot.com/contacts/XXXX/contact/YYYY>',
   properties: {
     firstname: { value: 'firstname' },
     associatedcompanyid: { value: '4485041729' },
     HubSpot_owner_id: { value: '49833766' },
     jobtitle: { value: 'Managing Director' },
     lastmodifieddate: { value: '1601371630904' },
     ns_id: { value: '1173440' },
     hs_object_id: { value: '7723801' },
     hs_lead_status: { value: 'Contacted' },
     createdate: { value: '1600323250214' },
     company: { value: 'company' },
     email: { value: 'email' },
     lastname: { value: 'lastname' }
   },
   'form-submissions': [],
   'identity-profiles': [
     {
       vid: 7723801,
       'saved-at-timestamp': 1600323250246,
       'deleted-changed-timestamp': 0,
       identities: [Array]
     }
   ],
   'merge-audits': []
 }```

Just to answer my own question in case it helps anyone else. Add to options:
```propertyMode: "value_and_history",```

Hey guys, using the accounting extensions API, I'm creating an invoice via HubSpot, once I reach the 'Which products to add to the invoice' step, I'm stuck. It says that to proceed I need to add at least 1 product from my service, which is the case, yet the 'Next' button stays greyed out. Anyone know more about this?

Anyone have any experience with <https://vanillaforums.com/|Vanilla Forums>? Interested how it works with the HubSpot CMS â€” mainly interested in the SSO functionality. I was told HubSpot would need to allow for a jsConnect SSO. Thanks!
Hi guys - I can't figure out which endpoint to use to get all the information on a deal and the products used in the deal. Any ideas?

Hi <@U01BMLQ34R1> for deal information you can get from this endpoint `*`/crm/v3/objects/deals/{dealId}`*`

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/deals>
